title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement [INSERT CONTACT METHOD]. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

what: oncoPharmaDB - Targeted and non-targeted anticancer drugs and drug regimens
title: Dataset with targeted and non-targeted anticancer drugs
text: R package provides dataset method query targeted non-targeted cancer drugs, including comprehensive annotations per target, drug mechanism--action, approval dates, clinical trial phases various indications etc. main dataset largely based drug-target-indication associations provided Open Targets Platform (Ochoa et al., Nucleic Acids Res., 2021), limited associations cancer-relevant indications (provided sigven/oncoPhenoMap). Drug-target associations Open Targets Platform furthermore integrated drug information NCI Thesaurus, append non-targeted cancer drugs (chemotherapies etc.) different drug regimens. oncoPharmaDB also provides drug biomarkers, curated databases CIViC, CGI Anti-cancer drugs currently provided following tentative drug categories/types (necessarily mutually exclusive), indicative mechanism--action: Alkylating agents Angiogenesis inhibitors Anthracyclines Antimetabolites AR antagonists BET inhibitors Hedgehog antagonists HDAC inhibitors Hormone therapies Immune checkpoint inhibitors Kinase inhibitors Monoclonal antibodies PARP inhibitors Platinum compounds Proteasome inhibitors Topoisomerase inhibitors Tubulin inhibitors Currently (May 28th 2022), oncoPharmaDB built upon following releases external databases: Open Targets Platform (2022.04) ChEMBL (v30) NCI Thesaurus (22.04d)

what: Datasets of compound biomarkers - omics properties that are linked to drug response — compound_biomarkers
title: Datasets of compound biomarkers - omics properties that are linked to drug response — compound_biomarkers
text: Datasets compound biomarkers - omics properties linked drug response

title: Datasets of compound biomarkers - omics properties that are linked to drug response — compound_biomarkers
Datasets of compound biomarkers - omics properties that are linked to drug response — compound_biomarkers
text: curated - data frame 295,230 rows 26 columns: evidence_id - evidence identifier evidence_url - evidence URL variant_id - variant identifier variant_type - type variant variant - variant (alias) alteration_type - type genetic alteration symbol - drug target (gene symbol) therapeutic_context - therapeutic context (drug sensitivity/resistance) disease_ontology_id - disease ontology () identifier (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) cancer_type - tumor type/disease (provided source) molecule_chembl_id - ChEMBL compound identifier citation_id - citation identifier (PMID etc) evidence_description - evidence description evidence_type - evidence type evidence_level - evidence level evidence_direction - evidence direction clinical_significance - clinical significance variant_origin - variant origin (somatic/germline) biomarker_source_db - type biomarker source database biomarker_entity - logical indicating biomarker entity efo_id - EFO identifier (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) efo_name - EFO name (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) do_name - disease ontology () name (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) cui - disease UMLS identifier (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) cui_name - disease UMLS name (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) primary_site - primary tumor site (mapped - oncoPhenoMap) invitro_screen - data frame 10,172 rows 8 columns: compound_id - compound identifier (PRISM) model - type omics drug prediction model (DepMap/PRISM) feature_type - type omics feature feature_value - value omics feature feature_importance - omics feature importance prediction_accuracy - model prediction accuracy nci_concept_display_name - Primary drug name (NCI Thesaurus) molecule_chembl_id - ChEMBL compound identifier

title: Datasets of compound biomarkers - omics properties that are linked to drug response — compound_biomarkers
text: https://civicdb.org/ https://www.cancergenomeinterpreter.org/biomarkers https://pmkb.weill.cornell.edu/ https://mitelmandatabase.isb-cgc.org/ https://depmap.org/portal/

what: Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens — get_onco_drugs
title: Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens — get_onco_drugs
text: Retrieve antineoplastic drugs drug regimens

title: Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens — get_onco_drugs
code: get_onco_drugs(   drug_is_targeted = F,   drug_is_approved = F,   drug_target = NULL,   drug_action_type = NULL,   drug_indication_main = NULL,   source_opentargets_only = F,   drug_has_blackbox_warning = F,   drug_approved_later_than = 1939,   drug_minimum_phase_any_indication = 0,   list_per_drug_synonym = F,   output_resolution = "drug2target2indication",   output_style = "extensive",   is_alkylating_agent = F,   is_angiogenesis_inhibitor = F,   is_anthracycline = F,   is_antimetabolite = F,   is_ar_antagonist = F,   is_bet_inhibitor = F,   is_hedgehog_antagonist = F,   is_hdac_inhibitor = F,   is_hormone_therapy = F,   is_immune_checkpoint_inhibitor = F,   is_kinase_inhibitor = F,   is_monoclonal_antibody = F,   is_parp_inhibitor = F,   is_platinum_compound = F,   is_proteasome_inhibitor = F,   is_topoisomerase_inhibitor = F,   is_tubulin_inhibitor = F )

title: Retrieve antineoplastic drugs and drug regimens — get_onco_drugs
text: drug_is_targeted logical indicating resulting drug records contain molecularly targeted drugs drug_is_approved logical indicating resulting drug records contain approved drugs drug_target character vector drug targets (gene symbols) drug records included results drug_action_type character vector drug action types include drug record list - possible values "INHIBITOR","AGONIST","MODULATOR","ANTAGONIST","BLOCKER","ACTIVATOR","BINDING AGENT","OPENER", "STABILISER","CROSS-LINKING AGENT",DISRUPTING AGENT","" drug_indication_main character vector main tumor types drug(s) indicated possible values "Adrenal Gland","Biliary Tract","Bladder/Urinary Tract","Bone","Breast","Cervix","CNS/Brain", "Colon/Rectum","Esophagus/Stomach","Eye","Head Neck","Kidney","Liver","Lung","Lymphoid","Myeloid","Ovary/Fallopian Tube", "Pancreas","Penis","Peripheral Nervous System","Peritoneum","Pleura","Prostate","Skin","Soft Tissue","Testis","Thymus", "Thyroid","Uterus","Vulva/Vagina" source_opentargets_only logical indicating resulting drug records contain drug records Open Targets Platform drug_has_blackbox_warning logical indicating resulting drug records contain drugs black box warnings drug_approved_later_than include records drugs approved later date (year) drug_minimum_phase_any_indication include drug records clinical phase (indication) greater equal phase list_per_drug_synonym list resulting drug records per drug synonym output_resolution output record resolution ('drug','drug2target','drug2target2indication') output_style comprehensiveness drug records ('extensive' - annotations, 'narrow' - main annotations) is_alkylating_agent logical indicating drug class wanted is_angiogenesis_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_anthracycline logical indicating drug class wanted is_antimetabolite logical indicating drug class wanted is_ar_antagonist logical indicating drug class wanted is_bet_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_hedgehog_antagonist logical indicating drug class wanted is_hdac_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_hormone_therapy logical indicating drug class wanted is_immune_checkpoint_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_kinase_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_monoclonal_antibody logical indicating drug class wanted is_parp_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_platinum_compound logical indicating drug class wanted is_proteasome_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_topoisomerase_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted is_tubulin_inhibitor logical indicating drug class wanted

what: Dataset of targeted and non-targeted cancer drugs — oncopharmadb
title: Dataset of targeted and non-targeted cancer drugs — oncopharmadb
text: dataset containing extensive collection anti-cancer drugs, .e. targeted compounds, chemotherapy regimens etc. data harvested Open Targets Platform, NCI Thesaurus, ChEMBL. Note entry corresponds "drug synonym-target-indication association"

title: Dataset of targeted and non-targeted cancer drugs — oncopharmadb
Dataset of targeted and non-targeted cancer drugs — oncopharmadb
text: oncopharmadb - data frame 543,728 rows 49 columns: drug_name - Primary drug name (upper case, NCI Thesaurus) nci_concept_display_name - Primary drug name (NCI Thesaurus) drug_type - type drug molecule (Antibody, small molecule etc) drug_action_type - main action elicited drug (antagonist, inhibitor, stabiliser etc) molecule_chembl_id - ChEMBL compound identifier drug_max_phase_indication - maximum clinical phase drug (given indication) drug_max_ct_phase - maximum clinical phase drug (indication) target_genename - name/description drug target target_symbol - symbol drug target target_type - type drug target (single protein, protein family etc.) target_ensembl_gene_id - Ensembl gene identifier drug target target_entrezgene - Entrez gene identifier drug target target_uniprot_id - UniProt identifier drug target disease_efo_id - EFO (Experimental Factor Ontology) identifier drug indication disease_efo_label - EFO (Experimental Factor Ontology) label drug indication cui - UMLS metathesaurus identifier (concept unique identifier) drug indication cui_name - UMLS metahesaurus name drug indication primary_site - primary tumor site/type (obtained https://github.com/sigven/oncoPhenoMap) nci_concept_synonym - drug synonym (NCI, Open Targets Platform) nci_concept_synonym_all - drug synonyms (NCI Thesurus, Open Targets Platform) drug_clinical_source - underlying source drug entry (DailyMed, clinicaltrials.gov, FDA etc.) drug_approved_indication - logical indicating drug approved indication drug_blacbox_warning - logical indicating drug blackbox warning drug_year_first_approval - year drug first approved drug_clinical_id - drug clinical identifier (clinicaltrials.gov, DailyMed, FDA etc.) nci_t - NCI Thesaurus identifier nci_concept_definition - detailed description drug mechanism--action (NCI Thesaurus) nci_version - version NCI used version oncoPharmaDB chembl_version - version ChEMBL used version oncoPharmaDB opentargets_version - version Open Target Platform used version oncoPharmaDB comb_regimen_indication - logical whether use drug given condition context drug combination immune_checkpoint_inhibitor - logical indicating drug immune checkpoint inhibitor topoisomerase_inhibitor - logical indicating drug topoisomerase inhibitor tubulin_inhibitor - logical indicating drug tubulin inhibitor kinase_inhibitor - logical indicating drug kinase inhibitor hdac_inhibitor - logical indicating drug HDAC inhibitor parp_inhibitor - logical indicating drug PARP inhibitor bet_inhibitor - logical indicating drug BET inhibitor ar_antagonist - logical indicating drug androgen receptor antagonist monoclonal_antibody - logical indicating drug antibody antimetabolite - logical indicating drug antimetabolite angiogenesis_inhibitor - logical indicating drug angiogenesis inhibitor alkylating_agent - logical indicating drug alkylating agent platinum_compound - logical indicating drug platinum compound anthracycline - logical indicating drug anthracycline proteasome_inhibitor - logical indicating drug proteasome inhibitor hormone_therapy - logical indicating drug hormone therapy hedgehog_antagonist - logical indicating drug hedgehog pathway antagonist fda_epc_category - FDA Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) text phrase

title: Dataset of targeted and non-targeted cancer drugs — oncopharmadb
text: https://targetvalidation.org/ https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl/ https://ncithesaurus.nci.nih.gov/ncitbrowser/

what: Dataset of therapeutic and actionable targets in cancer — targets
title: Dataset of therapeutic and actionable targets in cancer — targets
text: list two data frames: druggable: data frame indicates drugs/compounds pr. target actionable: data frame actionable genes cancer (biomarkers , therapies, prognosis etc. (harvested various sources)

title: Dataset of therapeutic and actionable targets in cancer — targets
Dataset of therapeutic and actionable targets in cancer — targets
text: druggable - data frame 1,014 rows 6 columns: symbol - Gene symbol ensembl_gene_id - Ensembl gene identifier genename - Gene description entrezgene - Gene identifier (Entrez) nci_concept_display_name - Primary compound name (separated '|') molecule_chembl_id - ChEMBL compound identifier (separated '|') actionable - data frame 624 rows 7 columns: symbol - Gene symbol ensembl_gene_id - Ensembl gene identifier genename - Gene description entrezgene - Gene identifier (Entrez) phenotypes - List associated phenotypes actionable gene clinical_significance - Clinical significance biomarker (prognosis, drug sensitivity etc) source_db - Underlying source database actionability evidence
